BiblioData.Title: Transfectable micelles containing semiconductor nanocrystals
BiblioData.Abstract: Methods, compositions and articles of manufacture for encoding a cell with semiconductor nanocrystals and/or other fluorophors are provided. The encoded cells can be subjected to functional assays in mixed populations, and an assay result can be determined and associated with individual cells by virtue of their code. The methods are particularly useful in multiplex settings where a plurality of encoded cells are to be assayed. The methods are used in screening methods for G protein coupled receptors (GPCRs), for identifying the ligands and functions of orphan GPCRs, and for screening for modulators of GPCRs. Kits comprising reagents for performing such methods are also provided.

Claims.P: 1. A composition, comprising a micelle or liposome in aqueous solution, wherein the micelle or liposome comprises one or more semiconductor nanocrystals, wherein the micelle or liposome in aqueous solution is suitable for transfection of a cell with the semiconductor nanocrystal.
2. The composition of claim 1, wherein the one or more semiconductor nanocrystals comprises a core and a shell.

3. The composition of claim 2, wherein the core is selected from the group consisting of ZnS, ZnSe, ZnTe, CdS, CdSe, CdTe, HgS, HgSe, HgTe, MgS, MgSe, MgTe, CaS, CaSe, CaTe, SrS, SrSe, SrTe, BaS, BaSe, BaTe, GaN, GaP, GaAs, GaSb, InN, InP, InAs, InSb, Ge, Si, PbS, PbSe, and an alloy or mixture thereof.
4. The composition of claim 2, wherein the core is or comprises CdS, CdSe, CdTe, ZnSe, ZnTe, GaP or GaAs.
5. The composition of claim 2, wherein the core is or comprises CdSe.
6. The composition of claim 2 or claim 4, wherein the shell is or comprises ZnS, GaN, MgS, MgSe or MgTe.
7. The composition of claim 2 or claim 4, wherein the shell is or comprises ZnS.
8. The composition of claim 2 or claim 4, wherein the core is CdSe and the shell is a 1 to 10 monolayer thick shell of CdS.

9. The composition of any preceding claim, wherein the micelle is formed using a micelle forming agent selected from emulsifying agents, cholic acid and derivatives thereof, phosphatides, detergents, cationic lipids.
10. The composition of claim 9 wherein the phosphatide comprises at least one saturated fatty acid residue that is branched.
11. The composition of any of claims 1 to 8, wherein the micelle is formed using an amphiphilic block copolymer as the micelle forming agent.

12. The composition of claim 11, wherein the amphiphilic block copolymer comprises diblock, triblock or multiblock copolymer, which contains at least one block of a hydrophobic segment and one block of a hydrophilic segment.
13. The composition of any of claims 1 to 8 wherein the liposome comprises a lipid, a cationic phospholipid, a neutral phospholipid, or a mixture thereof.
14. The composition of claim 1 wherein micelle comprises a chemically crosslinked hydrophilic shell, where the surface of the micelle is made up with carboxyl groups.
15. The composition of any preceding claim, further comprising a cell.
